name: Tile Jumper (Maximino)
description:
Tile Jumper

Try to stay on top with jumping and moving.

Settings

Edit the Settings of your experience to your liking … simply go to the settings Page and edit. There’s the possibility to reset the settings also.

Stats

See your Statistics which include: Highscore, average Score, and Tryouts.

Controls

You will find them in the pause menu of the game or here.

actionkeyjump space Go left a Go right d Quick Restart r
